Title: MVVM T4
Description: T4 Templates for generating view models, and views for WPF, Silverlight, Windows Phone using T4 Toolbox and MVVM Light
HomeWiki:
Project Description
T4 Templates for generating view models, and views for WPF, Silverlight, Windows Phone using T4 Toolbox and MVVM Light

Now on Nuget! Type in "Install-Package MVVMT4"

Generates your view model, view and view code behind for you. Saves you a bunch of time while creating views.

Version 2.1: Added support for using without view model locator (wpf/silverlight) for situations like MEF while retaining design mode. Added ModelBase for models/Non-mvvm-light view model locator.

Version 2.0: Conforms to StyleCop rules, and optional Autofac/Ninject/StructureMap/Unity/Simple IOC DI container for ViewModels.
